channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect arrested after car crashes into post office and catches fire in San Jose, California
item.description: Authorities say a suspect was arrested after a car crashed into a post office in San Jose, California, causing the building to go up in flames.

item.title: Suspect in Los Angeles car-ramming incident has a criminal history and was on parole, police say
D-Day veteran and TikTok star ‘Papa Jake’ Larson dies at 102
